Package gov.tak.platform.widgets.config

Class ConfigWidgetController

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.tak.platform.widgets.AbstractWidgetController<ConfigWidgetModel>
      • gov.tak.platform.widgets.config.ConfigWidgetController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPropertyBindingObject.OnPropertyValueChangedListener<IMapWidget>, IWidgetController
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConfigMapMenuWidgetController
    public class ConfigWidgetController
extends AbstractWidgetController<ConfigWidgetModel>
    Controller for any widget where the model is a ConfigWidgetModel. Calling refreshProperties or refreshProperty will trigger a change to the widget property value given as extracted from the ConfigWidgetModel. The model value be changed by calling `resetDefinition`
